page.title: 13LETWELL POST OFFICE
page.content: {The post office in Letwell}opens at 9 O'clock and closes at half past five.It sometimes closes at noon. Mrs Clark who owns the post office lives at the post office with her family. Mrs Clark has been working at that post office for about five and a half years. She likes working there because of all the people she meets.{There are {two post men who deliver the letters {in their post vans. The post man that works at Letwell doesn't live in Letwell he lives in the next village Woodsetts.{There are aproximatly 12 {letters and 6 customers a day.}The post office only weighs parcels and sells stamps. The post office is quite small but Letwell is lucky to have it because it is such a small village.
